dict.string: A starting point for a Sparrow-Framework game. It provides a view controller to manage the view and is set initially for Landscape. This can be modified in 'SparrowBonesViewController.h'. Sparrow-Framework source is copied to the new project's folder.

KEYWORDS="TODO:|FIXME:|\?\?\?:|\!\!\!:" find ${SRCROOT} \( -name "*.h" -or -name "*.m" \) -print0 | \ xargs -0 egrep --with-filename --line-number --only-matching "($KEYWORDS).*\$" | \ perl -p -e "s/($KEYWORDS)/ warning: \$1/"
